15:39.concept: Do not follow the whims of your heart or what your eyes see

6:23.concept: The priests must bless the Israelite nation daily

29:1.concept: Hear the ram's horn on the Feast of Trumpets
29:1.category: πᾶν ἔργον λατρευτὸν οὐ ποιήσετε· ἡμέρα σημασίας ἔσται ὑμῖν.

29:1.concept: Bring additional offerings on the Feast of Trumpets

10:9.concept: Sound the ram's horn when going to war

5:30.concept: Fulfill the laws of the woman suspected of adultery

5:15.concept: Do not put oil on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
5:15.category: עֲשִׂירִת הָאֵיפָה קֶמַח שְׂעֹרִים; לֹא-יִצֹק עָלָיו שֶׁמֶן

5:15.concept: Do not put frankincense on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery

30:2.concept: Do not break oaths or vows

6:5.concept: The nazarite must let his hair grow
The nazarite must not cut his hair

6:3.concept: The nazarite must not eat fresh grapes
The nazarite must not eat raisins

6:4.concept: The nazarite must not eat grape seeds
The nazarite must not eat grape skins

6:6.concept: The nazarite must not be under the same roof as a corpse

6:7.concept: The nazarite must not come into contact with the dead
6:7.category: 7 ἐπὶ πατρὶ καὶ ἐπὶ μητρὶ καὶ ἐπ᾿ ἀδελφῷ καὶ ἐπ᾿ ἀδελφῇ

6:9.concept: The nazarite must shave his head after bringing sacrifices upon completion of his nazarite period

18:26.concept: The Levite must set aside a tenth of his tithe for the priest

18:24.concept: Set aside a tithe each planting year and give it to a Levite
18:24.category: 24 ὅτι τὰ ἐπιδέκατα τῶν υἱῶν Ισραηλ

15:20.concept: Set aside a portion of dough for a priest

18:15.concept: Redeem firstborn sons and give the money to a priest

35:2.concept: Give the Levites cities to inhabit and their surrounding fields

18:5.concept: Do not leave the Temple unguarded

7:9.concept: The Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders

18:23.concept: The Levites must work in the Temple

18:3.concept: No Levite must do the work of either another priest or another Levite

5:2.concept: Send the impure person from the Temple

5:3.concept: An impure person must not enter the Temple

18:4.concept: One who is not a priest must not serve

28:3.concept: Offer two lambs for sacrifice every day

28:9.concept: Bring two additional lambs as burnt offerings on the Sabbath

28:11.concept: Bring additional offerings on the first day of the month

28:26.concept: Bring additional offerings on the Feast of Weeks

29:8.concept: Bring additional offerings on the Day of Atonement

29:12.concept: Bring additional offerings on the Feast of Tabernacles

29:35.concept: Bring additional offerings on the eighth day of the Feast of Tabernacles

9:11.concept: Eat the second Passover lamb on the night of the 15th day of the month after Passover

7:12.concept: Do not break any bones from the second Passover lamb offering

9:12.concept: Do not leave the meat of the second Passover lamb over until morning

18:17.concept: Do not redeem the firstborn animals

19:14.concept: Carry out the laws of impurity of the dead

19:2.concept: Carry out the procedure of the Red Heifer

19:21.concept: Carry out the laws of the sprinkling water
19:21.category: καὶ ὁ ἁπτόμενος τοῦ ὕδατος τοῦ ῥαντισμοῦ ἀκάθαρτος ἔσται ἕως ἑσπέρας·

35:31.concept: Do not accept monetary restitution to atone for a murderer

35:25.concept: The court must send the accidental murderer to a city of refuge

35:32.concept: Do not accept monetary restitution instead of being sent to a city of refuge

35:12.concept: Do not kill a murderer before he stands trial
Do not pity a person who pursues an individual accused of murder
35:12.category: A Murder and the Preservation of Life

27:8.concept: Carry out the laws of the order of inheritance

35:30.concept: A witness must not serve as a judge in capital crimes
35:30.category: καὶ μάρτυς εἷς οὐ μαρτυρήσει ἐπὶ ψυχὴν ἀποθανεῖν.
